Articles.Content:
Mods:

Texture Replacer v1.7.4

Eve v7.4

Astronomer's Visual Pack - Edge of Oblivion - Can't find version number, was released 7-21-14

DDSloader v1.2.0

Custom Skybox from Green Skull

Using Windows 64bit, but have same issue in 32bit

Have tried various custom suits from J's suit pack and Green Skull Inc and they all look shaded incorrectly, at the very least they're too dark. I installed clean version and just added visual mods, pretty sure this was happening even with only Texture Replacer installed along with some custom suits.

Will try to upload image of menu screen where it's most noticeable.

To compare what it should look like, here's an upload from the creator of the suit, looks like it's rendering the grey one.

Actually, looking closer, it seems to be rendering a different texture or a combination of two.

I've also noticed when doing an eva that one side of the helmet and parts of the suit will look like they're constantly in shadow no matter where the light source is at.

Edited October 23, 2014 by TalonHawk
Added More Info
